mapper.select: /* B_Listener.xml - callListenerList */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_broadcast_room_member(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

/* B_Listener.xml - callForceLeave */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_broadcast_room_member_forced_leave(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
